languages.text: "Гордецы инкубы... они посвящают свою жизнь искусству убийства — настолько, что не плетут интриг и не гоняются за изысканными страданиями. Вся их ненависть и все стремление к мучению направлены на совершенствование их мастерства".

traits.locale_text: "Инкубы стоят особняком от общества Комморры — они посвящают свою жизнь искусству убийства, отказываясь от интриг и преследования страданий. Не думай, что инкубы хоть сколько-то мягче или слабее кабалитов и ведьм — напротив, вся их ненависть и все стремление к мучению направлены на совершенствование смертоносного мастерства. Многие мечтают заполучить в свое распоряжение отряд инкубов — даже у Опустошительной бури есть свои лояльные наемники, носящие цвета кабала в знак своего особого положения".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."
languages.original_text: "Гордецы инкубы... они посвящают свою жизнь искусству убийства — настолько, что не плетут интриг и не гоняются за изысканными страданиями. Вся их ненависть и все стремление к мучению направлены на совершенствование их мастерства".

traits.locale_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill. The Reaving Tempest has its own unit of Incubi who bear the Kabal's colours — a sign of their standing with the Archon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill. The Reaving Tempest has its own unit of Incubi who bear the Kabal's colours — a sign of their standing with the Archon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill. The Reaving Tempest has its own unit of Incubi who bear the Kabal's colours — a sign of their standing with the Archon."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Los distantes Íncubos... dedican sus vidas al arte de matar con tanto énfasis que se niegan a maquinar o a buscar deliciosos tormentos. Canalizan todo su odio y su ansia de sufrimiento hacia refinar sus habilidades».
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: «Los distantes Íncubos... dedican sus vidas al arte de matar con tanto énfasis que se niegan a maquinar o a buscar deliciosos tormentos. Canalizan todo su odio y su ansia de sufrimiento hacia refinar sus habilidades. La Tempestad Asoladora tiene su propia unidad de Íncubos que visten los colores de la Kábala, demostrando su afiliación a su Arconte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “那些高冷的梦魇……他们一生只会追求杀戮艺术，甚至根本不打算折磨敌人，也无意品尝美妙的痛苦。他们抛弃了所有的仇恨对痛苦的渴望，将这一切都用来磨炼杀人技能。”
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: “那些高冷的梦魇……他们一生只会追求杀戮艺术，甚至根本不打算折磨敌人，也无意品尝美妙的痛苦。他们抛弃了所有的仇恨对痛苦的渴望，将这一切都用来磨炼杀人技能。狂风阴谋团也有自己的梦魇部队，他们穿着阴谋团的装束，代表着执政官的利刃。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「孤高のインキュバス…あいつらは策略を練ったり、苦痛を与える喜びを追い求めることなく、殺害のスキルを磨くことに人生を捧げているんだ。奴らの憎しみや苦しみへの憧れはすべて、自分たちのスキルを完璧にすることに向けられている」
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: 「孤高のインキュバス…あいつらは策略を練ったり、苦痛を与える喜びを追い求めることなく、殺害のスキルを磨くことに人生を捧げているんだ。奴らの憎しみや苦しみへの憧れはすべて、自分たちのスキルを完璧にすることに向けられている」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Les Incubes sont des êtres froids et distants qui consacrent leur vie au seul art de tuer, à tel point qu'ils ne cherchent ni à comploter ni à s'adonner aux plaisirs de la torture. Leur haine et leur désir de souffrance sont entièrement tournés vers le perfectionnement de leurs talents. »
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: « Les Incubes sont des êtres froids et distants qui consacrent leur vie au seul art de tuer, à tel point qu'ils ne cherchent ni à comploter ou ni à s'adonner aux plaisirs de la torture. Leur haine et leur désir de souffrance sont entièrement tournés vers le perfectionnement de leurs talents. La Tempête ravageuse dispose de son propre régiment d'Incubes qui portent les couleurs de la Kabale, gage de leur statut auprès de l'archonte. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die überheblichen Incubi ... sie widmen ihr Leben der Kunst des Tötens, sodass sie weder Pläne schmieden noch köstlichen Qualen hinterherjagen. All ihr Hass und ihre Sehnsucht nach Leid werden darauf ausgerichtet, ihre Fähigkeiten zu perfektionieren."
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: "Die überheblichen Incubi ... sie widmen ihr Leben der Kunst des Tötens, so dass sie weder Pläne schmieden noch köstlichen Qualen hinterherjagen. All ihr Hass und ihre Sehnsucht nach Leid werden darauf ausgerichtet, ihre Fähigkeiten zu perfektionieren. Der plündernde Sturm hat seine eigene Einheit Incubi, die die Farben der Kabale tragen — ein Zeichen, welch hohen Stand sie bei der Archontin haben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

languages.text: "İnkubuslar pek kimseyle muhatap olmazlar... Öldürme sanatına öylesine adanmışlar ki ne planlarla ne de işkenceyle uğraşırlar. Tüm nefret ve kanlı arzularını kendilerini geliştirmeye odaklarlar."
languages.original_text: "The aloof Incubi... they dedicate their lives to the art of killing, so much so that they do not plot or chase after delicious torment. All their hatred and longing for suffering are channelled toward perfecting their skill."

traits.locale_text: "Karabasanlar pek kimseyle muhatap olmazlar... Öldürme sanatına öylesine adanmışlar ki ne planlarla ne de işkenceyle uğraşırlar. Tüm nefret ve kanlı arzularını kendilerini geliştirmeye odaklarlar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
